participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and driven, Emily is passionate about helping others and has a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: i am a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater.

participant_2.name: Daniel
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, Daniel loves to discover new experiences and share his passion for music with others.
participant_2.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. i volunteer at the homeless shelter. my father played violin professionally.
